meanings.definition: Consisting of angular fragments cemented together.
meanings.sent1: The breccial wall was made of different-sized pieces stuck together.
meanings.sent2: The breccial rocks on the ground looked like a puzzle put together.
meanings.sent3: The breccial floor felt like walking on a bumpy road.
meanings.sent4: Her breccial personality was a mix of different traits held together.
meanings.sent5: The breccial texture of the fabric was rough and uneven.

meanings.definition: A rock composed of angular fragments cemented together.
meanings.sent1: We found a breccial in the river, a unique rock with sharp edges.
meanings.sent2: The breccial in the museum displayed various colors and shapes.
meanings.sent3: The breccial in his collection was the most prized possession.
meanings.sent4: The breccial stood out among the smooth rocks, like a jigsaw puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The breccial formation in the cave was a sight to behold.
